title: Game disconnection
body:
Hello riot.
While we were having a game and getting destroyed by an 8/0 Nasus with 387 stacks, the game suddenly disconnected. I don't know if someone was hacking in the game or it's the game itself. I'm in a premade team with my friends and they all have the same issue. Please fix this.

Cheers.
https://puu.sh/x8e8P.jpg

replies.body:
Hey there,

This also happened to me as well. It looked as though this problem is coming from RIOT and not from us.
Just to clarify a little bit about the game, it doesn't actually show on the match history whether we won or lost. So I don't know what is going on. I feel as though it is a ddos.
